apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji on Apple devices depicts two women embracing, with one in a medium skin tone and the other in a medium-dark skin tone, a radiant heart floating above them.  Apple's signature glossy 3D shading gives the figures a soft, polished look, while the heart glows with a vibrant, inviting hue.  The gentle curves and subtle highlights convey deep affection, partnership, and romantic love, celebrating diverse relationships through Apple's inclusive visual language.
